The 2025 edition is under way, with the Ralph Morse Shield the prize for the top overall club. Photo / Paul Rickard

Fri, 07 Feb 2025 01:00:00 +0000 The sprawling 762 sqm home on Parakiore Rd, in Ngararatunua, Whangārei, is an icon and can be spotted from various parts of the city.

Fri, 07 Feb 2025 00:51:06 +0000 Insurers have already paid out $62 million to Bremworth, and the balance of $42.2 million was expected to be paid as soon as possible. Photo / Supplied
Paengaroa house fire spreads to shelterbelt https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-ply-ply-times/news/paengaroa-house-fire-fire-spreads-to-shelterbelt/hf2md6ljurbodb2e6zum2bq724/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-ply-ply-times/news/paengaroa-house-fire-fire-spreads-to-shelterbelt/hf2md6ljurbodb2e6zum2bq724/ Tom EleyFire crews battle house fire and shelterbelt blaze near school. The best thing about Prime Minister Christopher Luxon’s absence from Waitangi - Audrey Young https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-best-the-best-the-bout-prime-minister-minister-christopher-luxon-luxons-absence-from-waitang--waitang-audrey-young/gzkupn6lhjeztkftuw24y6o24y6o2pu/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-best-the-best-the-bout-prime-minister-minister-christopher-luxon-luxons-absence-from-waitang--waitang-audrey-young/gzkupn6lhjeztkftuw24y6o24y6o2pu/ Audrey YoungOPINION: Luxon's absence shone a light on the best speech about the Treaty in many years. Fri, 07 Feb 2025 00:21:06 +0000 Justin Tipa's speech on Waitangi Day showed "the leadership that has been missing in the debate not just over the Treaty Principles Bill but the direction of the country and how the Treaty should fit into our constitutional monarchy in modern times," writes Audrey Young. Photo / Supplied

Fri, 07 Feb 2025 00:01:28 +0000 The sentence for Tihema Nuttall, also known as rapper Temm Dogg, will stay the same despite a calculation "error" from the judge. Photo / Andrew Warner
Whangārei joins Minecraft project as teen recreates city in game https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-joins-minecraft-minecraft-project-project-aas-as-teen-recreates-city-city-in-game/7xtk2i6nd5aevemivno7et6y2a/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-joins-minecraft-minecraft-project-project-aas-as-teen-recreates-city-city-in-game/7xtk2i6nd5aevemivno7et6y2a/ Yolisa TswanyaWhangārei is now on Minecraft as part of a global project. Thu, 06 Feb 2025 23:30:00 +0000 Northland teenager Sebastian Sobr-Sosnowski started actively building Whangārei on Minecraft last month and started with Okara Park.
